languages.text: "Тогда прощай, {name}. Пусть Всеотец направляет твою руку. Надеюсь, дороги наши еще пересекутся, и я познакомлю тебя со своими братьями".

traits.locale_text: "Я услышал тебя, тан — да будет так".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."
languages.original_text: "Тогда прощай, {name}. Пусть Всеотец направляет твою руку. Надеюсь, дороги наши еще пересекутся, и я познакомлю тебя со своими братьями".

traits.locale_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brothers can meet."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brothers can meet."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “那么，就此别过了，{name}。愿全父指引你。我希望我们以后能再次见面，这样你就可以见到我的兄弟们了。”
languages.original_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."

traits.locale_text: “那么，就此别过了，{name}。愿全父指引你。我希望我们以后能再次见面，这样你就可以见到我的兄弟们了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je vous fais mes adieux, {name}. Puisse le Père de Tous vous guider. J'espère que nos chemins se croiseront à nouveau pour que vous puissiez rencontrer mes frères. »
languages.original_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je vous fais mes adieux, {name}. Puisse le Père de Tous vous guider. J'espère que nos chemins se croiseront à nouveau pour que vous puissiez rencontrer mes frères. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces, me despido, {name}. Que el Padre de todas las cosas le guie. Espero que nos volvamos a encontrar y pueda así conocer a mi gente».
languages.original_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, me despido, {name}. Que el Padre de todas las cosas le guie. Espero que nos volvamos a encontrar y pueda así conocer a mi gente».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「さらばだ、{name}。全知の父がお前の手を導かんことを。お前と俺の兄弟たちが会えるように、お前たちの道が再び交わることを願っているぞ」
languages.original_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."

traits.locale_text: 「さらばだ、{name}。全知の父がお前の手を導かんことを。お前と俺の兄弟たちが会えるように、お前たちの道が再び交わることを願っているぞ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "So lebt denn wohl, {name}. Möge der Allvater Eure Hand führen. Ich hoffe, unsere Wege kreuzen sich wieder, damit Ihr meine Brüder kennenlernen könnt."
languages.original_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."

traits.locale_text: "So lebt denn wohl, {name}. Möge der Allvater Eure Hand führen. Ich hoffe, unsere Wege kreuzen sich wieder, damit Ihr meine Brüder kennenlernen könnt."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "O hâlde elveda {name}. Yücebaba sana rehber olsun. Yollarımız yine kesişsin ki seni kardeşlerimle tanıştırabileyim."
languages.original_text: "Farewell then, {name}. May Allfather guide your hand. I hope our paths will cross again so you and my brethren can meet."
